title: Find the Githyanki Creche
content:
ae'zels guidance, it may be harder to find the cure she mentioned. Vlaakith and Inquisitor W'wargaz tried to kill us. It might still be worth investigating the Githyanki Crèche for a way to remove our parasites.

Go to the Crèche Infirmary

The guards told us to report to the Crèche Infirmary, where the doctor will inspect us. Vlaakith and Inquisitor W'wargaz tried to kill us. It might still be worth investigating the Crèche Infirmary for a way to remove our parasites.

Speak to Ghustil Stornugo
